body:
I just get banned, I have to appeal to send a message to this mail? support@avicus.net
thx and good night :D

title: I have a question..

replies.body:
Hello TheDarkTrane!

Yes, in order to appeal your ban, you must email support@avicus.net.

Good luck. :)
